==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|み|な|つき|k3=づき|yomi=k}}

===Etymology===
[[水]] (みず, ''mizu''), "water" + [[無]] (な, ''na'') as a [[euphonious]] but meaningless [[当て字]] (''[[ateji]]'') + [[月]] (つき, ''tsuki''), "month"

===Pronunciation===
* {{ja-pron|みなづき|y=k|acc=2|acc_ref=NHK}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|みなづき}}

[[Category:Japanese nouns|みなづき]] <!--overriding-->

# {{lb|ja|archaic|sort=みなづき}} the sixth month of the lunar calendar
# {{lb|ja|poetic|sort=みなづき}} the month of water; [[June]]
